Package com.soctec.soctec.achievements

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Achievement
    Achievements can be configured many different ways and contains Demands which must be completed to complete the Achievement.
    AchievementCreator
    An AchievementCreator creates Achievement objects on request, either from a resource, or via public methods.
    AchievementUnlocker
    Handles created achievements that are not yet completed, checks for completion
    Demand
    Demands are used by Achievements to determine if it is completed or not
    Stats
    Stats contains information about game progress
